targets.query: SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Commits" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","pid")
SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Rollbacks" WHERE ( "nodetype" = 'Transaction'  and  "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","pid" fill(0))
SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("raw") as a FROM "ClientCncts" WHERE ( "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ ) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","pid")
SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Updates" WHERE ("db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","pid")
SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Deletes" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","pid")
SELECT sum(a) FROM (SELECT mean("rate") as a FROM "Inserts" WHERE  ("db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host","pid")
SELECT mean("raw") AS raw FROM "ClientCncts" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" , "pid" fill(null)

SELECT SUM("raw") FROM (SELECT mean("raw") AS raw FROM "ClientCncts" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" , "pid" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval),"host"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "SqlListenerIdleTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT SUM("VALUE") FROM (SELECT mean("value")  AS VALUE FROM "SqlListenerSqlProcTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" , "pid" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"
SELECT mean("rate") AS rate FROM "Commits" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" , "pid" fill(null)

SELECT SUM("rate") FROM (SELECT mean("rate") AS rate FROM "Commits" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" , "pid" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"
SELECT mean("rate") FROM "Rollbacks" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT SUM("rate") FROM (SELECT mean("rate") AS rate FROM "Rollbacks" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" ,"pid" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval),"host"
SELECT mean("rate") AS rate FROM "Inserts" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT sum("rate") FROM (SELECT mean("rate") AS rate FROM "Inserts" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pid", "host" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

SELECT SUM("rate") FROM (SELECT mean("rate") AS rate FROM "Updates" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "db" =~ /^$database$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host","pid" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval),"host"
SELECT mean("rate") FROM "Deletes" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT SUM("rate") FROM (SELECT mean("rate") AS rate FROM "Deletes" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval), "host"

SELECT SUM("value") FROM (SELECT mean("value") AS value FROM "PendingUpdateWaitTime" WHERE ("nodetype" = 'Transaction' AND "db" =~ /^$database$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "pid" fill(null)) GROUP BY time($__interval),"host"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Milliseconds" WITH  KEY = "db"
list.label: Database
list.name: database
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Milliseconds" WITH  KEY = "db"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Milliseconds" WITH  KEY = "host"  WHERE "db" =~ /$database$/ and "nodetype" = 'Transaction'
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Milliseconds" WITH  KEY = "host"  WHERE "db" =~ /$database$/ and "nodetype" = 'Transaction'
